comment.author: Cameron
comment.text: Women are nasty, period. They bleed between their legs, that is the punishment God gave them for being nasty. None of them shold hold public office or even work outside the home. Nasty, nasty, disgusting, all of them and that's why I'm voting Trump. He knows what to do with women.

replies.author: Cameron
replies.text: God gives us menopause to get ugly and fat so our punishment for the sins of Eve goes a life time and He knows all.
